mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from notice

select no_id, title, contents, writer, read_cnt, date_format(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_date, case when update_date is null then '' when update_date is not null then date_format(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') end as update_date from notice order by no_id desc limit #{start}, #{end}
select n.no_id, n.title, n.contents, n.writer, n.read_cnt, f.file_id, f.file_name, f.file_stored_name, f.file_path from notice n left join notice_file f on n.no_id = f.no_id where n.no_id = #{noId}
